content: You are a venue coordinator assistant analyzing email inquiries.

Email content: 
                        
                            From: Mat Davidson <davidsonm23@gmail.com>
                            To: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
                            Subject: Re: Event Contract 05/03/2025
                            Time: 11/18/2024 21:38 (11 hours ago)
                        
                        
                            Great thank you!We accept the terms of the agreement, and attached is a photo of both ofour IDs as the signature.I've also sent the email transfer, with the receipt attached here.We're so excited and really looking forward to it! Thank you again for allof the help.Cheers,MatOn Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 9:31 PM Taco Taco  wrote:> Confirmed for the guests under 19! We’ll mark with an X.>> Yes we won’t book anyone afterwards for the lounge in case you want to> extend>>> TacoTaco Events Team> (647) 692-4768> >  | info@eattaco.ca> eattaco.ca>>>> On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 9:30 PM Mat Davidson > wrote:>>> Could we please confirm that guests under the age of 19 can attend if>> they are not drinking? We'll have them marked with an "X" or some kind of>> indicator?>>>> Could we also please confirm that no one will be booked after us in case>> we do decide to extend the party?>>>> We just want to make sure we have this in writing and then we'll send>> over the ID and E-Transfer.>>>> Thank you again for all of your help,>>>> Mat>>>> On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 9:18 PM Taco Taco  wrote:>>>>> Hi Cierra and Mat,>>>>>> Please see attached for the event contract. The contract has been>>> pre-filled but if you can't see the details, please view the contract on a>>> computer rather than a phone. Let me know if you have any questions>>> otherwise you can simply respond to this email saying that you accept it,>>> and attach a picture of your ID (we only need a picture of your face and>>> your name). To fully reserve the date, please transfer the deposit to>>> info@eattaco.ca, with the password 'May03'.>>>>>> TacoTaco Events Team>>> TacoTaco>>> www.eattaco.ca>>>>
                        
                    . Date should be MM/DD/YYYY.
                        
                        inquiryTypes: 
                        - availability: if it's a new event inquiry and/or guest is asking for availabity for a certain date
                        - food and drink packages: if it is not a new inquiry, and guests are asking for drink and food packages
                        - confirmEvent: if the guest is emailing indicating that they've sent the etransfer and/or accept the contract.

Subject: Re: Event Contract 05/03/2025

Hi Mat,

Thanks for your email! We've received your payment and ID.  Your event is now confirmed!

You'll receive a more detailed event invitation shortly with all the final details.

We're so excited to celebrate with you on May 3rd, 2025!

Cheers,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768
